worldwide and um we follow them around

what you can delegate to technology and

Delegation in practice right so um this
is probably the thing I'm most

and the fact is that millions of people
do it just from a design perspective we
didn't really understand how they did it
and so that that's just one small
example of the kind of research that we
were doing and it turns out that
illiterate people are masters of
Delegation so they delegate that part of

stuff that they can't do

devices sente is a a word in Uganda that
